name: Gerald's Adventures
description:
Overview

Gerald's Adventures is a 3D Platformer with a unique web traversing mechanic. Collect all the bugs before time runs out!

Features

  • 3D Platformer
  • Web Traverse Mechanic
  • Collect-a-thon

Controls (XBOX Controller):

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Right Stick - Look
  • A - Jump
  • Right Trigger (RT) - Spawn Web
  • Start - Pause

Development

The game is currently in Alpha but progression is still being made. I plan to produce more levels, enemies, and power ups. I also plan to reproduce the traversing system, improve AI and have it playable on more platforms/resolutions.
